<b>Pes</b> <b>pedis</b> <br> <small>m.</small>   <p> <b>1</b> &ensp; <small>Cic.</small> &ensp; pé de homem, dos brutos, da meza, & c. <br> <b>2</b> &ensp; pé de verso. <br> <b>3</b> &ensp; <small>Vitr.</small> &ensp; pé, medida geometrica de 4 palmos, 12 pollegadas, ou 6 dedos. <br> <b>4</b> &ensp; <small>Virg.</small> &ensp; corda, com que se vira a véla. <br> <b>5</b> &ensp; <small>Varr. no plur.</small> &ensp; piolhos. <br> <b>6</b> &ensp; pes. <br> <b>7</b> &ensp; <small>Plin.</small> &ensp; moedura de azeitona, quanto de huma vez se espreme no lagar. </p>   <p><small>[EXEMPLOS]</small><br> <br><b>X</b><br>pede uincto, & soluto &ensp; <small><small>Tib</small></small> &ensp; <small>Em verso, e em prosa</small> <br> pedem dare &ensp; <small><small>Cic</small></small> &ensp; <small>Ajudar</small> <br> pedem referre &ensp; <small><small>Ovid</small></small> &ensp; <small>Recuar, fazer pá atrás</small> <br> pedem reflectere &ensp; <small><small>Cat</small></small> &ensp; <small>Recuar, fazer pá atrás</small> <br> pedem reportare &ensp; <small><small>Virg</small></small> &ensp; <small>Recuar, fazer pá atrás</small> <br> pedem reuocare &ensp; <small><small>Virg</small></small> &ensp; <small>Recuar, fazer pá atrás</small> <br> pedem trahere &ensp; <small><small>Ovid</small></small> &ensp; <small>Andar coxeando, coxear</small> <br> pedes nauales &ensp; <small><small>Plin</small></small> &ensp; <small>Remeiros, ou chusma da náo</small> <br> pedibus stipendia facere &ensp; <small><small>Liv</small></small> &ensp; <small>Ser soldado infante</small> <br> pedibus uerba claudere &ensp; <small><small>Hor</small></small> &ensp; <small>Fazer versos</small> <br> quo te pedes? &ensp; <small><small>Virg</small></small> &ensp; <small>Para onde vás tu?</small> </p>
